title: CMOS Analog Integrated Circuits and Systems IV
description: PLL: Phase noise effect, VCO, phase detector, charge pump, integer/fractional-N frequency synthesizer, clock and data recovery, decision feedback. Filter: Continuous-time filter, I-Q complex filter, raised-cosine, Gaussian, delay, zero equalizers. Recommended preparation: ECE 251A. Digital Signal Processing I (ECE 251A). Prerequisites: ECE 250 and ECE 264A; graduate standing.
